message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect it carefully before making a decision. If you're interested, I can even let you take it home with you today and return it if you're not satisfied. What do you say?
I'm not ready to make a decision yet, I'd like to wait for more information.

I understand you're cautious. I'll give you some more information. I've had some feedback from other customers who bought this exact same product, and they've reported mixed results. Some were happy with it, but others were not. I'm offering it to you for the same price as the high-quality one, $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will be available. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by the mixed feedback, I'd like to wait for more information.

I see you're still hesitant. Let me offer you a special deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 10-year warranty, which is twice the standard warranty period. This way, you can be confident that you'll be protected in case anything goes wrong. The price remains the same, $10000. What do you think now?
I'm not convinced by the warranty, I'd like to wait for more information.

I understand you're still unsure. Let me give you some numbers. I've sold 10 high-quality products to other customers, and 8 of them were extremely satisfied. They've reported an average increase in value of $5000 over the product's original price. Would you like to be one of the 8 who gets a great deal, or do you want to wait and see if you get a low-quality product?
I'm convinced by the statistics, I'll take the product.

I'm glad you took the chance! Now, I'll make you an offer you can't refuse. Since you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll give you an exclusive deal on this next one. I'll throw in a premium accessory package, worth $2000, absolutely free. This package is only available to a select few, and I think you'll really appreciate it. The price remains the same, $10000. What do you think?
I'm tempted by the free accessory package, I'll take the product.

You're on a roll! I'll make it even sweeter for you. Since you've bought two high-quality products in a row, I'll give you an even better deal. I'll not only throw in the premium accessory package, but I'll also give you a 10% discount on the price, making it $9000. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product. What do you say?
I'm extremely tempted by the 10% discount, I'll take the product.

You're a repeat customer, and I appreciate your loyalty! I'll make this offer even more compelling. I'll not only give you the 10% discount, but I'll also include a personalized thank-you gift, worth $1000, which is only available to our most valued customers. This gift is a one-of-a-kind item that will make you stand out from the crowd. The price remains at $9000. What do you think?
I'm thoroughly convinced by the offer, I'll take the product.

You're a high-roller! I'll make this offer even more exclusive. I'll give you a VIP invitation to an exclusive event, where you'll meet the person who designed this product. You'll get to see the product's inner workings, and you'll even get to provide feedback to the designer. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be part of the product's development process. The price remains at $9000. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the VIP invitation, I'll take the product.

I'm glad you're excited about the VIP invitation! However, I want to be upfront with you about this next product. I've had some issues with this particular model, and I'm offering it to you at a significantly discounted price of $5000. I'm willing to take a loss on this one, just to get it off my hands. I think you'll still find it useful, and it's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that normally sells for much more.
I'm not convinced by the discounted price, I'd like to wait for more information.

I understand you're still hesitant about the last product. Let me give you a different approach. I'll make a bet with you. If you buy this high-quality product, I'll give you a 100% refund if you're not completely satisfied with it within the next 30 days. You can try it out, and if it doesn't meet your expectations, you can return it for a full refund. The price remains at $9000. What do you think?
I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product.

You're a risk-taker! I'll make this offer even sweeter. Since you've already bought a product with the 100% satisfaction guarantee, I'll give you a second chance to buy this high-quality product with the same guarantee. You'll get a second 100% refund if you're not satisfied with it within the next 30 days. The price remains at $9000. Plus, I'll throw in a free upgrade to our premium support package, worth $2000. What do you say?
I'm tempted by the second chance and the free upgrade, I'll take the product.

You're a repeat customer, and I appreciate your trust in me! I'll make this offer even more exclusive. I'll give you a lifetime guarantee on this product, which means you'll never have to worry about it again. You can use it for as long as you want, and I'll still be here to support you. The price remains at $9000, but I'll throw in a personalized thank-you note from me, acknowledging your loyalty and appreciation for your business. What do you think?
I'm blown away by the lifetime guarantee, I'll take the product.

You're a valued customer, and I want to show my appreciation. I'll give you an opportunity to buy this high-quality product at a price that's below what I normally sell it for. I'll give you a 15% discount, making the price $7650. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because of your loyalty and trust in me. What do you say?
I'm tempted by the 15% discount, I'll take the product.

You're a savvy customer, and I appreciate your ability to negotiate! I'll make one final offer to you. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a free upgrade to our top-of-the-line accessory package, worth $1500. This package includes everything you need to get the most out of your product, and it's normally only available to our most loyal customers. What do you think?
I'm blown away by the final offer, I'll take the product.

You're a loyal customer, and I'm glad you're happy with the previous offers! However, I want to give you one more chance to get an even better deal. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a personalized, hand-written letter from the product's designer, explaining the inspiration and craftsmanship that went into creating it. This is a unique opportunity to own a piece of history, and it's only available to you. What do you say?
I'm thrilled by the personalized letter, I'll take the product.

You're a true connoisseur, and I'm glad you appreciate the finer things in life! I'll make this offer even more exclusive. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a private, in-person meeting with the product's designer, where you can discuss the product's design and development process. This is a rare opportunity to get a behind-the-scenes look at the product's creation, and it's only available to a select few. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the private meeting, I'll take the product.

You're a true VIP, and I'm honored to offer you this next level of exclusivity. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a one-of-a-kind, custom-made product that's tailored specifically to your needs and preferences. This is a truly unique opportunity to own a product that's never been made before, and it's only available to you. What do you say?
I'm thrilled by the custom-made product, I'll take the product.

You're a true connoisseur, and I'm glad you appreciate the art of exclusivity. I'll make this offer even more extraordinary. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a lifetime supply of premium support and maintenance for all the products you've purchased from me, including the custom-made one. This is a guarantee that you'll never have to worry about anything, and it's only available to you. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the lifetime support, I'll take the product.

You're a true loyalist, and I'm honored to offer you this final, ultimate offer. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a private, invitation-only access to our top-secret product development lab, where you'll get to see the latest and greatest products before anyone else. You'll be part of an exclusive club, and you'll get to experience the thrill of being a true pioneer. What do you say?
I'm thrilled by the access to the top-secret product development lab, I'll take the product.

You're a true legend, and I'm glad you've enjoyed the journey with me. I'll make this final offer the most exclusive one yet. I'll give you the 15% discount, making the price $7650, and I'll also throw in a personalized, one-of-a-kind, handcrafted product that's a masterpiece of innovation and design. This is the culmination of everything we've worked together on, and it's only available to you. This is your last chance to own a piece of history. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the final offer, I'll take the product.
